H0.text: Which bridge connects Detroit, Michigan, USA and Windsor, Ontario, Canada. Ambassador Bridge

H1.text: Which bridge connects Detroit, Michigan, USA and Windsor, Ontario, Canada. Detroit River Bridge

H2.text: Which bridge connects Detroit, Michigan, USA and Windsor, Ontario, Canada. Windsor-Detroit Bridge

H3.text: Which bridge connects Detroit, Michigan, USA and Windsor, Ontario, Canada. WPYF269

A4.text: The Ambassador Bridge is an international suspension bridge across the Detroit River that connects Detroit, Michigan, United States, with Windsor, Ontario, Canada.
